description: Tools for monitoring products approaching expiration dates

tools.name: get_expiring_products
tools.description: Retrieves products that are expiring within a specified number of days

days_until_expiry.description: Number of days from today to check for expiring products

category.description: Optional product category to filter results

location.description: Optional warehouse or store location to filter results

tools.name: get_product_expiry_details
tools.description: Gets detailed expiry information for specific products including batch numbers and exact expiry dates

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to get expiry details for

tools.name: get_inventory_alerts
tools.description: Retrieves active inventory alerts for expiring products and stock levels

alert_type.description: Type of alert to filter by (expiry, low_stock, overstock)
